ygData.msgSnippet: (OOC:) True they may have lungs....but does that mean they re organic? Consider medical technology. When our lungs fail can we not get artifical lungs built or

(OOC:)

True they may have lungs....but does that mean they're organic? 
Consider medical technology. When our lungs fail can we not get 
artifical lungs built or be put on a machine that mimics the effect 
of "breathing". So yes maybe they need to breathe but still there's 
no proof either for or against, to be honest, that the beast forms 
use organic bits.

Anyways in the long run I don't think it really matters eh? :)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Not necesarily, jhogan.  Remeber when Cheetor said "Cant 
breathe" when 
> he was in beast mode?
